nodes.text: Meg Kelpito was a male Quarren criminal, who operated out of Providence during the Galactic Civil War.

Kelpito was the hangar chief of the pirate lair of Providence during the Galactic Civil War. He was also representative of the Quarren population. Little is known about his past, but Colonel Viyenah of the Imperial Intelligence suspected him to have been one of Seggor Tels' followers.

Kelpito was enigmatic and silent, plunged in melancholy. He was always composed and slow and rarely took decisions but, when he decided something, it was always a wise decision. As all the Quarrens who resided in Providence, he didn't mix with the rest of the population.
Meg Kelpito was created by Jean-Michel Ringuet for the ambiguously canon roleplaying help "Providence" which appeared in the French magazine Avalon 1.
